name: Buggy Mess (MEGAgameBoy)
description:
Your friend want you to go buy the new game that just came out, you will need to get out of your cave (litteraly) to go touch grass uh… i mean go buy the game at the store.

 

This game was been made using Gamemaker 8.1 for the PSP.

https://github.com/KuromeSan/chovy-gm
